chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Trees
Yes
hey there, near which object on the map you see the trees? need a little more to navigate
¡impresionante! así que se agradecerían más detalles amigo
¿Adónde debo dirigirme primero?
Giraffe
alright! so i am going left from my starting point, past the twig and tiger, towards the big island with the elephant, and west of him lies the giraffe
correcto?
Yes
groovy! which way am i heading next, pal?
South towards the snake
you got it, boss! going southeast from the giraffe towards the snake
what's up next?
Then the treasure is right past the snake
¡dulce! Dirígete 2 pasos hacia el este, pasa la serpiente y, oye, ¡llegaste al tesoro! *terminado* ¡Buen trabajo, amigo! ¿qué es lo siguiente?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
Yes
¡excelente! En primer lugar, avancemos un poco hacia el oeste, justo debajo del banco de madera.
¿entiendo?
Yes
brilliant
now make a 180 degree turn to the left and cross the path again towards the white dog. Are you doing well so far?
I think so. I’m at the picnic area
¡fantástico! ahora simplemente sigue el camino hacia el sur sobre la alfombra de picnic y juguetea un poco alrededor del cuenco de bayas.
este va hacia el oeste. ¿puedes hacer eso?
Yes
great, now see a wooden branch? cross it and make your way north
you doing ok so far?
Yep! Where next?
great! look for a green bush, then go around it from the right side, and continue until you reach the florist stand
how's it going?
I’m there!
ahh, perfecto! now turn left, pass under the florist stand and head towards the bridge. you'll see two folks cycling on it
continue past the bridge. let me know when you're there
I’m there
¡buen trabajo! Ahora, ¿ves a esos dos viejos leyendo el periódico? dirígete unos pasos hacia el sur entre ellos y la rama de madera.
Deberías terminar junto a un arbusto verde. ¿Está funcionando hasta ahora?
Yes
¡impresionante! ahora, da unos pasos hacia el este, entre la rama y el arbusto.
Dime cuando termines

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
Yes I’m ready
¡Frío! Estoy en la tienda en el norte.
¿Adónde debo dirigirme ahora?
Head south towards the cute dog, but go slightly past, then head east on the path towards the fire
alright! just passed the dog, now at the fire
do i move towards the mushroom next?
Yes, continue past the fire on its northern side and then head to the path just south of the mushrooms
made! I'm on the road, just south of the red mushroom
Where Next?
Back to the path to the west of the car, then head south. -east on the path
okay, i walked back and am now heading south near the blue car
i see a blue telescope up ahead. good?
Round the telescope, then head west-north-west to the cabin!
cool! i just rounded the telescope and i'm heading wnw now
i see some rocks and a house. this it?
Yes. Straight to the front of the house!
as easy as pie! just arrived at the house
*finished*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
Yes I am!
awesome, let's go! start at those three palm trees in the top north-east
now, head under the first tree to your south-west. cool?
Yes. Passing north of the dog
¡No, espera! Después del primer árbol, gire a la derecha y cruce el segundo árbol, luego gire a la izquierda antes de la tercera palmera.
continuar hacia el sur. ¿lo entendiste?
Yes.
¡impresionante! lo estás haciendo bien
Ahora muévete un poco a la izquierda de ese cachorro marrón que está más adelante.
Ok
brilliant
then turn slightly left, then turn right towards the south. you're doing well?
Not sure. Where should I be? I’m to the left of the dog above the two rocks
bingo! now, walk between the big rock (on your left) and the small rock (on your right)
straight ahead until you reach the water
Ok I’m there
awesome sauce! now, wade into the water
remember to wave at the red crab!
Ok
now, turn right-west and walk along that big rock in the water
can you see it?
Toward the spark?
nope, not there yet. you're looking for a medium-sized rock
after you pass it, you'll spot a shark in the water. what you gonna do? that's right! make a sharp turn to the right. you see it?
Shark
yup! now, head back to land quickly and look for the blue-yellow-white ball
I’m just south of the ball
¡gran trabajo! Ahora cruza entre la roca mediana y la bola, y continúa hacia el norte.
Ok
carril a la izquierda y diríjase al noroeste
see a red tent on your left and a speaker on your right?
Yes
¡dulce! Bordee la tienda en semicírculo y luego diríjase hacia el sur, hacia la orilla del agua.
Ok
¡genial! pero antes de llegar al agua, gira a la derecha debajo de ese kayak rojo
¿estás en el camino?
Yes
turn right (north), stroll along the kayak and reach that small green bush
you did it! that's our final objective. how was the trip?

Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: It just takes a few moments for my brain to adjust to the language change.
